chapter.text: inna erselna nuhan ila kavmihi en enzir kavmeke min kabli ey ye'tiyehum `azabun elim
kale ya kavmi inni lekum nezirum mubin
eni-`budu-llahe vettekuhu veeti`un
yagfir lekum min zunubikum veyuehhirkum ila ecelim musemma. inne ecele-llahi iza cae la yu'ehhar. lev kuntum ta`lemun
kale rabbi inni de`avtu kavmi leylev venehara
felem yezidhum du`ai illa firara
veinni kullema de`avtuhum litagfira lehum ce`alu esabi`ahum fi azanihim vestagsev siyabehum veesarru vestekberu-stikbara
summe inni de`avtuhum cihara
summe inni a`lentu lehum veesrartu lehum israra
fekultu-stagfiru rabbekum innehu kane gaffara
yursili-ssemae `aleykum midrara
veyumdidkum biemvaliv vebenine veyec`al lekum cennativ veyec`al lekum enhara
ma lekum la tercune lillahi vekara
vekad halekakum atvara
elem terav keyfe haleka-llahu seb`a semavatin tibaka
vece`ale-lkamera fihinne nurav vece`ale-ssemse siraca
vellahu embetekum mine-l'ardi nebata
summe yu`idukum fiha veyuhricukum ihraca
vellahu ce`ale lekumu-l'arda bisata
litesluku minha subulen ficaca
kale nuhur rabbi innehum `asavni vettebe`u mel lem yezidhu maluhu veveleduhu illa hasara
vemekeru mekran kubbara
vekalu la tezerunne alihetekum vela tezerunne veddev vela suva`av vela yeguse veye`uka venesra
vekad edallu kesira. vela tezidi-zzalimine illa dalala
mimma hatiatihim ugriku feudhilu naran felem yecidu lehum min duni-llahi ensara
vekale nuhur rabbi la tezer `ale-l'ardi mine-lkafirine deyyara
inneke in tezerhum yudillu `ibadeke vela yelidu illa faciran keffara
rabbi-gfir li velivalideyye velimen dehale beytiye mu'minev velilmu'minine velmu'minat. vela tezidi-zzalimine illa tebara
